entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, who is helping Neville and taking charge of the situation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's wand was taken by Harry from the floor. She is not present in this scene but her wand is mentioned.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is injured and his dad's old wand was broken. He is being helped by Harry.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The baby-headed Death Eater is causing chaos in the room, toppling grandfather clocks and overturning desks.

relationships.description: Harry took Hermione's wand from the floor and gave it to Neville.
Harry is helping Neville, who is injured, by taking charge of the situation and guiding him through the room.
The baby-headed Death Eater is causing chaos in the room, toppling grandfather clocks and overturning desks.
